name: Minimal Wimp.com
description: Wimp.com in a minimal fashion. Removes bulk, recommended videos, comments, facebook related things, and more! Clean, simple, and right to the point!
additional_info:
Wow wimp rewrote their site pretty nice like, heres something to make it back to normal minimal rice

- rewrote all css to fix wimps site update
- there are a few things i cant fix, like the random button, and the white box above the video list, and pictures page, thats a needed box. sorry ;(
